description:
Law Offices Of David W. Holub, Indiana Personal Injury Lawyer

Attorney David Holub has been in practice since 2005. His office is located 44 miles southeast of downtown Chicago, in Merrillville, Indiana, just a short distance from the Lincoln Highway on Merrillville Road. A personal injury lawyer, he serves clients in Merrillville, nearby Schererville, Gary and throughout Lake, Porter, LaPorte, Newton, Starke and Jasper counties in Indiana.

Mr. Holub has been board certified as a civil trial advocate since 1996, one of the youngest lawyers to be certified by the National Board of Trial Advocacy. He is admitted to the Indiana state and U.S. District Courts and the U.S. Supreme Court. He received his law degree from Valparaiso University, where he was associate editor of the Valparaiso University Law Review from 1981 to 1982. He is a member of the Lake County and Indiana State Bar Associations, the Association of Trial Lawyers of America and the Indiana Trial Lawyers Association. The Top Trial Lawyers in America appointed him to the Million Dollar Advocates Forum. He was listed as a Super Lawyer in 2013.

Mr. Holub and his staff handle cases concerning personal injuries sustained in car and truck accidents, pedestrian accidents, car and train collisions, industrial accidents, and wrongful death suits. His team works hard, and his paralegal assistants are always in the office to keep clients updated on their cases.

The Law Offices of David W. Holub accepts evening and weekend appointments and makes in- home visits by appointment only.
